content.title: Uses
content.description: Ornamental plant. Decoction made from the bark is used to treat malaria and uterine cancer. Seed and oil extract possess antibacterial activity. Phytochemicals such as essential oils, terpenoids, steroids, flavonoids, tannins, coumarins, cardioglycosides, phenols and flavones are present.
